instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 180C. Stud the blood orange with cloves and bake for 30 minutes. Put the apple juice cinnamon stick, nutmeg and maple syrup in a large saucepan. Bring to the boil, add the baked blood ornange, reduce the heat and simmer for 5 minutes.
Pre-warm the punchbowl usig hot water. Remove the punch from the heat and stir in the pineapple, lemon and blood orange juices.
Pour into the bowl and ladle into heat-resistant glasses. Garnish with sliced orange and star anise.
